title: AFFiNE 0.11.0 - Launch Week - Day 3/5: Beyond Text: Color, History, Table of Content and More Possibilities
description: Explore revolutionary features on day 3 of AFFiNE 0.11.0 launch week! Dive into enchanting color options, a flexible database, history tracking, and a cool table of contents. Embark on a digital adventure in knowledge crafting and organization!
